images.caption: European Beech – it is well-known due to its fruits; the spiny cupule cracks by four flaps and releases nuts – brown, shiny, sharp three-sided achenia
European Beech – young leaves are shiny, fresh green, with long whitish cilia on the margin
European Beech – yellowish bundles of small male flowers
European Beech – the bark is silver-grey, smooth even in old trees
European Beech – leaves, flowers and fruits; colorized drawing by Josef Dohnal
